original_text: Someone has already found the donkeys that you lost three days ago. Do not think any more about them. The only thing that the Israelite people want now is you! They want you and all your father's family.’
korean_text: 사흘 전에 잃은 네 암나귀들을 염려하지 말라 찾았느니라 온 이스라엘이 사모하는 자가 누구냐 너와 네 아버지의 온 집이 아니냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Someone has already found the donkeys
that you lost three days ago
Do not think any more about them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에 대해 더 이상 생각하지 마세요

sentences.original_text: The only thing that the Israelite people want now
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 지금 원하는 유일한 것은

sentences.original_text: They want you and all your father's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신과 당신 아버지의 모든 가족을 원합니다
